title: Albion Online Finally Makes The Leap To The Epic Games Store
text:
Albion Online Finally Makes The Leap To The Epic Games Store
It only took eight years.
Today, Sandbox Interactive announced that its F2P sandbox MMORPG Albion Online would be joining the Epic Games Store library. The game will officially launch on the platform on April 16, hopefully encouraging new players to try the game out.
Currently, the game is listed on the store and players can add it to their wishlist. Note that to play Albion Online on the Epic Games Store, you will need to create a new account and link it to your Epic Games account. This means that those with existing accounts on other platforms can not connect their game to Epic, not that we’re entirely sure why you’d want to hop to another platform at this point anyway if you're already playing.
